description: portrait of Jan van Eyck sitting at table, facing right, wearing hat, fur trimmed cloak, and neclace; pointing right with left hand
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [Objit Perugis, ibden in cathedrali basillica contitus/ 2/ JOANNES AB EYCK, PICTOR/ (six lines of Latin) Ille ego ...non abnuit orbem/ Domenicus Lapsonius/ Th. Galle excud.]; in pencil on sheet: [1-385]
portfolio: From from:Pictorum Aliquot Celebrum Germaniae Effigies Illustrum Quos Belgium Habuit Pictorum Effigies Antwerpae (1600), plate 2
title: Joannis Ab Eyck, Pictor
